name: Traffic - Alpha Prototype V2.0
description:
Traffic: The Alpha Build, created by Just Design Bliss  ~ Just Bliss Games.  Red Illustrated Car  speedster model, overview of Traffic gameplay in background.

I've challenged myself to create 12 games in 2018.

The first is a driving game that I'm simply calling Traffic. 

Enjoy and please fill out the survey after you've played.

Graphics designed by Just Design Bliss; Other Cars by 1001.com
